mapper.select: select categoryNo, categoryName from category where storeNo=2 and publicYN = 1 order by categoryNo asc

select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isSpecial from(select rownum rn, menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isSpecial from(select menuNo, m.categoryNo categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isSpecial from menu m , category c where m.categoryNo = c.categoryNo and c.storeNo=2 and c.publicYn=1 and m.categoryNo=#{categoryNo} and unitNo=5 order by categoryNo asc)) where rn >= #{writing_Start} and rn <= #{writing_End}
select um.menuNo, sm.setNo, sm.categoryNo, sm.setName, sm.setPrice, sm.setImg, sm.setDesc, sm.isSpecial from setmenu sm, useMenu um where um.setNo = sm.setNo and sm.categoryNo=4
select count(*) from useMenu where menuNo=#{menuNo}
select m.menuNo menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isChange, unitNo from useMenu um, menu m where um.setNo(+) = m.menuNo and um.menuNo=#{menuNo}
select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isSpecial from menu where categoryNo=28 order by menuNo asc
select menuNo, categoryNo, menuName, menuDesc, menuPrice, menuImg, isSpecial from menu where categoryNo=29 order by menuNo asc
select categoryNo from menu where menuNo=#{menuNo}
select count(*) from menu where categoryNo=#{categoryNo} and unitNo=5
select t.toppingNo toppingNo, toppingName, toppingPrice, toppingImg, ut.menuNo menuNo from topping t, useTopping ut where ut.toppingNo(+) = t.toppingNo and t.storeNo=2 and ut.menuNo=#{menuNo}
